sentences.sContent: "I spent all my time craving some green space, something green to look at," she says.
sentences.sContent_eng: "I spent all my time craving some green space, something green to look at," she says.
sentences.sCn: “我所有的时间都在渴望一些绿色空间，某些看起来绿色的东西，”她说。

sentences.sContent: If you are still craving an illicit food after you exercise, indulge yourself a little.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you are still craving an illicit food after you exercise, indulge yourself a little.
sentences.sCn: 如果在练习之后你仍然渴望不良的食物，那就放纵一下你自己。

sentences.sContent: We find ourselves not only wanting to be with the person, but also craving that person.
sentences.sContent_eng: We find ourselves not only wanting to be with the person, but also craving that person.
sentences.sCn: 会发现我们不仅仅想与对方在一起，还特别渴望得到对方。

trans.tranOther: an extremely strong desire for something
